detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in an organic cotton chambray weave with a small opening and sewn-on bow at the front, straps with fasteners, and patch front pockets. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton pointelle with a button placket and seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Picot trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an embroidered detail at the top. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an embroidered detail at the top. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Baby Exclusive. A-line, sleeveless dress in soft, patterned slub jersey made from organic cotton. Narrow shoulder straps and gathered seams front and back.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a vest top and pair of puff pants in a soft organic cotton double weave. Vest top with narrow shoulder straps and puff pants with elastication at the waist and legs. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a vest top and pair of puff pants in a soft organic cotton double weave. Vest top with narrow shoulder straps and puff pants with elastication at the waist and legs. Lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and seams with short frill trims at the front and around the armholes. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and seams with short frill trims at the front and around the armholes. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with notch lapels, covered buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with notch lapels, covered buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Halterneck bralette in soft lace with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and a slit at the back.
Bikini briefs in mesh and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length, wide culottes in velour with an elasticated waist.
Oversized jumper in a jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped side pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud. Tab with a press-stud at the sides. Lined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy modal blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.
